Defeat of Muhammad Ghori

During the reign of Bhima II (Bhola Bhim), Muhammad Ghori attacked Gujarat in 1178 CE. The Solanki army, led by Bhima II and his mother Naikidevi, badly defeated Ghori in the Battle of Kayadara near Mount Abu. This was Ghori's first major defeat in India.

ЁЯУЙ
Decline of the Dynasty

Although he ruled for a long time, the power of the kingdom weakened and eventually his ministers (Vaghela) took power.
